Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS

Title: Relates to the contents of emergency response plans required to be submitted to the public service commission by electric corporations
Summary: Relates to the contents of emergency response plans required to be submitted to the public service commission by electric corporations; requires such plans to include details of staffing, equipment, and ability to perform toward certain standards; requires the public service commission to establish a time-based restoration schedule.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the contents of emergency response plans required to be submitted to the public service commission by electric corporations
